query.q: M::`sqlserver_performance`:(fill(AVG(`cntr_value`), linear) AS `活跃事务`) { `sqlserver_host` = '#{hostname}' and `counter_name` = 'Active Transactions' } BY `instance`
M::`sqlserver_performance`:(fill(AVG(`cntr_value`), linear) AS `分配`) { `sqlserver_host` = '#{hostname}' and `counter_name` = 'Active memory grant amount (KB)' } BY `instance`

M::`sqlserver_database_io`:(fill(AVG(`write_bytes`), linear) AS `文件增量`) { `sqlserver_host` = '#{hostname}' and `database_name` != 'tempdb' and `file_type` = 'LOG' } BY `database_name`, `file_type`, `logical_filename`, `physical_filename`

M::`sqlserver_database_io`:(fill(AVG(`write_bytes`), linear) AS `数据增量`) { `sqlserver_host` = '#{hostname}' and `database_name` != 'tempdb' and `file_type` = 'ROWS' } BY `database_name`, `file_type`, `logical_filename`, `physical_filename`

title: SQL Server 监控视图-精简版
